name: Leave Management System
description: A comprehensive leave management system that allows employees to request time off, managers to approve or reject leave requests, track leave balances, manage different leave types (vacation, sick leave, personal days), and maintain a centralized calendar of team absences.

name: Expense Management System
description: A comprehensive expense management system that allows employees to submit expense claims, managers to review and approve expenses, finance team to process reimbursements, and administrators to track and report on all expenses across the organization

name: Ticket Management System
description: A comprehensive ticket management system for tracking, assigning, and resolving customer support tickets or internal issues. The system should handle ticket creation, assignment to team members, status tracking, priority management, comments/updates, and resolution workflow.

data.label: Ticket Submitted
data.description: Initiates ticket management workflow when new ticket is created

data.label: Validate Ticket Data
data.description: Validates that all required ticket fields are provided

data.label: Auto-Categorize Ticket
data.script: ML classifier to categorize ticket based on title/description
data.description: Uses AI to automatically categorize and set initial priority

data.label: Priority Assessment
data.condition: Determines routing based on ticket priority
data.description: Routes ticket based on priority level (Critical/High/Medium/Low)

data.label: Critical Incident Response
data.instructions: Immediate response required for critical system issue

data.label: Auto-Assignment Gate
data.branches: Parallel assignment to team lead and automated analysis
data.description: Parallel processing for high priority tickets

data.label: Team Lead Assignment
data.instructions: Assign appropriate team member based on expertise

data.label: Knowledge Base Search
data.script: Search for similar resolved tickets and solutions
data.description: Automated search for existing solutions in knowledge base

data.label: Resolution Method
data.condition: Determines if ticket can be auto-resolved or needs manual intervention
data.description: Routes based on whether automated solution is available

data.label: Auto-Resolve Ticket
data.script: Apply automated solution and close ticket
data.description: Automatically resolves ticket using knowledge base solution

data.label: Manual Resolution
data.instructions: Manually investigate and resolve the ticket

data.label: SLA Monitor
data.description: Monitors ticket against SLA timeframes

data.label: SLA Status Check
data.condition: Checks if ticket is within SLA limits
data.description: Determines if escalation is needed based on SLA breach

data.label: Escalate Ticket
data.instructions: SLA breach - immediate management attention required

data.label: Resolution Notification
data.description: Notifies user that their ticket has been resolved

data.label: Customer Feedback
data.instructions: Please rate the resolution of your support ticket

data.label: Update Knowledge Base
data.script: Add new solution to knowledge base if applicable
data.description: Updates knowledge base with new solutions for future reference

data.label: Ticket Closed
data.description: Ticket management workflow completed successfully

data.label: Error Handler
data.script: Log error and route to fallback process
data.description: Handles system errors and routing failures

routing.reasoning: Ticket management systems require complex workflows with multiple states (created, assigned, in-progress, resolved, closed), parallel processing for notifications and escalations, advanced forms for ticket creation/updates with conditional fields, relational data for tickets/users/categories, and cross-platform mobile access. Ensemble approach needed to integrate workflow, data, and form complexity.
